trans-unit.source: Before using ad mediation, you'll need to set up accounts with each ad network that you’d like to use in your apps.
trans-unit.target: Before using ad mediation, you'll need to set up accounts with each ad network that you’d like to use in your apps.

trans-unit.source: Select and manage your ad networks
trans-unit.target: Select and manage your ad networks

trans-unit.source: Select and manage your ad networks
trans-unit.target: Select and manage your ad networks

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Before using ad mediation, you'll need to set up accounts with each ad network that you’d like to use in your apps.
trans-unit.target: Before using ad mediation, you'll need to set up accounts with each ad network that you’d like to use in your apps.

trans-unit.source: We recommend doing this before you add the ad mediator control to your Microsoft Visual Studio project.
trans-unit.target: We recommend doing this before you add the ad mediator control to your Microsoft Visual Studio project.

trans-unit.source: We also recommend that you set up accounts with as many ad networks as possible, so you have maximum flexibility to optimize your ad mediation performance.
trans-unit.target: We also recommend that you set up accounts with as many ad networks as possible, so you have maximum flexibility to optimize your ad mediation performance.

trans-unit.source: Supported ad networks and project types
trans-unit.target: Supported ad networks and project types

trans-unit.source: Currently, ad mediation is supported for the following ad networks and project types.
trans-unit.target: Currently, ad mediation is supported for the following ad networks and project types.

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app using C# or Visual Basic with XAML
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app using C# or Visual Basic with XAML

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 app using C# or Visual Basic with XAML
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1 app using C# or Visual Basic with XAML

trans-unit.source: Windows Phone 8.1 app using C# or Visual Basic with XAML
trans-unit.target: Windows Phone 8.1 app using C# or Visual Basic with XAML

trans-unit.source: Some project types, such as C++ with XAML and JavaScript with HTML, are not currently supported by ad mediation.
trans-unit.target: Some project types, such as C++ with XAML and JavaScript with HTML, are not currently supported by ad mediation.

trans-unit.source: For these project types, you can show ads from Microsoft Advertising without using ad mediation.
trans-unit.target: For these project types, you can show ads from Microsoft Advertising without using ad mediation.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [AdControl in XAML and .NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt313186.aspx) and [AdControl in HTML 5 and JavaScript](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt313130.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [AdControl in XAML and .NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt313186.aspx) and [AdControl in HTML 5 and JavaScript](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt313130.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Specific parameters and details for each network
trans-unit.target: Specific parameters and details for each network

trans-unit.source: Here are the specific details you'll need for each ad network, including how to set up your account and how to onboard an app.
trans-unit.target: Here are the specific details you'll need for each ad network, including how to set up your account and how to onboard an app.

trans-unit.source: We also list the required parameters that you need to provide when you [submit your app and configure ad mediation](submit-your-app-and-configure-ad-mediation.md) (and/or in Connected Services for [testing your ad mediation implementation](test-your-ad-mediation-implementation.md)).
trans-unit.target: We also list the required parameters that you need to provide when you [submit your app and configure ad mediation](submit-your-app-and-configure-ad-mediation.md) (and/or in Connected Services for [testing your ad mediation implementation](test-your-ad-mediation-implementation.md)).

trans-unit.source: For more details about using a specific ad network, visit its website.
trans-unit.target: For more details about using a specific ad network, visit its website.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the required parameters, each ad network also has additional optional parameters you can set via code in your app.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the required parameters, each ad network also has additional optional parameters you can set via code in your app.

trans-unit.source: For examples, see [Optional ad network parameters](#optionalparameters) later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: For examples, see [Optional ad network parameters](#optionalparameters) later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: For the complete list of optional parameters, see the documentation provided by each ad network.
trans-unit.target: For the complete list of optional parameters, see the documentation provided by each ad network.

trans-unit.source: Some of these parameters will be ignored or overwritten by ad mediation, and these are listed in the sections below.
trans-unit.target: Some of these parameters will be ignored or overwritten by ad mediation, and these are listed in the sections below.

trans-unit.source: For example, parameters related to current location are usually overwritten with information about the customer's location that is determined by the location capability within the app itself.
trans-unit.target: For example, parameters related to current location are usually overwritten with information about the customer's location that is determined by the location capability within the app itself.

trans-unit.source: Note that when you [add the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md) and specify which ad networks to use, Visual Studio attempts to fetch the required assemblies programmatically for some ad networks.
trans-unit.target: Note that when you [add the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md) and specify which ad networks to use, Visual Studio attempts to fetch the required assemblies programmatically for some ad networks.

trans-unit.source: If there are any assemblies that cannot be automatically retrieved, you can install them using the links shown below for each ad network.
trans-unit.target: If there are any assemblies that cannot be automatically retrieved, you can install them using the links shown below for each ad network.

trans-unit.source: To configure ad network parameters, use the [Monetize with ads](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt170658) page on the [Windows Dev Center dashboard](https://dev.windows.com/overview).
trans-unit.target: To configure ad network parameters, use the [Monetize with ads](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt170658) page on the [Windows Dev Center dashboard](https://dev.windows.com/overview).

trans-unit.source: Add the ad mediation control to your app, and submit your app to the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Add the ad mediation control to your app, and submit your app to the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: ApplicationId and AdUnitId: These parameters are automatically filled in for you when you submit your app package, based on the contents of your app.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationId and AdUnitId: These parameters are automatically filled in for you when you submit your app package, based on the contents of your app.

trans-unit.source: However, you can optionally edit these parameters when you [submit your app and configure ad mediation](submit-your-app-and-configure-ad-mediation.md).
trans-unit.target: However, you can optionally edit these parameters when you [submit your app and configure ad mediation](submit-your-app-and-configure-ad-mediation.md).

trans-unit.source: Height and Width (only required for Windows Phone 8 Silverlight and Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight).
trans-unit.target: Height and Width (only required for Windows Phone 8 Silverlight and Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight).

trans-unit.source: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).
trans-unit.target: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).

trans-unit.source: If you need to download them manually, go to the [Getting Started](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518029) section on the AdDuplex website.
trans-unit.target: If you need to download them manually, go to the [Getting Started](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518029) section on the AdDuplex website.

trans-unit.source: In the AdDuplex portal, create a new app.
trans-unit.target: In the AdDuplex portal, create a new app.

trans-unit.source: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).
trans-unit.target: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).

trans-unit.source: If you need to download them manually, go to the Downloads tab in the Smaato portal.
trans-unit.target: If you need to download them manually, go to the Downloads tab in the Smaato portal.

trans-unit.source: In the Smaato portal, go to My Spaces and generate a new Adspace.
trans-unit.target: In the Smaato portal, go to My Spaces and generate a new Adspace.

trans-unit.source: Height and Width (only required for Windows 8.1 XAML)
trans-unit.target: Height and Width (only required for Windows 8.1 XAML)

trans-unit.source: Get the Windows Phone 8 SDK from the [Google Mobile Ads SDK website](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518032).
trans-unit.target: Get the Windows Phone 8 SDK from the [Google Mobile Ads SDK website](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518032).

trans-unit.source: In the AdMob portal, select Monetize new app.
trans-unit.target: In the AdMob portal, select Monetize new app.

trans-unit.source: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).
trans-unit.target: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).

trans-unit.source: If you need to download them manually, sign in to your account and go to the SDK tab in the Dashboard to download the Windows Phone 8 SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you need to download them manually, sign in to your account and go to the SDK tab in the Dashboard to download the Windows Phone 8 SDK.

trans-unit.source: In the Inneractive portal, create a new app.
trans-unit.target: In the Inneractive portal, create a new app.

trans-unit.source: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).
trans-unit.target: First, try to let the ad mediator control retrieve the assemblies through Connected Services as described in [Add and use the ad mediator control](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md).

trans-unit.source: If you need to download them manually, go to the [SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=627078) section on the VMAX website.
trans-unit.target: If you need to download them manually, go to the [SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=627078) section on the VMAX website.

trans-unit.source: Obtain the Adspot ID for your app from the VMAX website (the Adspot ID is called ZoneId in the VMAX APIs).
trans-unit.target: Obtain the Adspot ID for your app from the VMAX website (the Adspot ID is called ZoneId in the VMAX APIs).

trans-unit.source: In addition to the required parameters, each ad network also has additional optional parameters you can set via code in your app.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the required parameters, each ad network also has additional optional parameters you can set via code in your app.

trans-unit.source: For the complete list of optional parameters, see the documentation provided by each ad network.
trans-unit.target: For the complete list of optional parameters, see the documentation provided by each ad network.

trans-unit.source: To set these optional parameters in your code, use the **AdSdkOptionalParameters** property of your **AdMediatorControl** object.
trans-unit.target: To set these optional parameters in your code, use the **AdSdkOptionalParameters** property of your **AdMediatorControl** object.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the **CountryOrRegion** parameter for Microsoft Advertising.
trans-unit.target: The following example demonstrates how to set the **CountryOrRegion** parameter for Microsoft Advertising.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the **Width** and **Height** parameters for Smaato.
trans-unit.target: The following example demonstrates how to set the **Width** and **Height** parameters for Smaato.

trans-unit.source: Add and use the ad mediation control
trans-unit.target: Add and use the ad mediation control

trans-unit.source: Submit your app and configure ad mediation
trans-unit.target: Submit your app and configure ad mediation
